New Records: Joey Cantillo pitched five scoreless innings, a career-high for him
Key Match Events: Lane Thomas and José Ramírez hit back-to-back home runs in the eighth inning
Replay review overturned a safe call at home, crucial for the Guardians
Post-Match Reflections: Lane Thomas and José Ramírez shared their pride in the team's performance
Rays' manager highlighted Junior Caminero's impressive play
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tampa Bay Rays are 5 1/2 games out of the AL wild-card berth
Game time lasted 2 hours and 16 minutes
Others: Umpires included Chad Whitson, Alan Porter, Sean Barber, and Austin Jones
